name: No World Left Behind
description:
Goal
Survive. Defeat enemies to not get overwhelmed and pick up power ups to help you. As the game goes on, the world you are in will get smaller and smaller until there is no room left to exist. Pick up Arrow Ups to give yourself more space to play.

How to play
Arrow Keys/WASD: Move.
Mouse1: Shoot where mouse is pointed on screen.
Shift: Slowdown player and show hitbox.
R: Reset after you lose.

Made for the Ludum Dare 38 Jam using the Löve framework.

Inspired by shmups in general and games like Geometry Wars.

Music by Zid Morin.

Minecraftia by Andrew Tyler used for personal use.
